importantArticles.title: Update: Kinross Gold Suspends Mill Operations at the Tasiast Mine Following a Fire

importantArticles.headline: TORONTO, April 15, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Kinross Gold Corporation (TSX: K; NYSE: KGC) (the “Company”) announced today a temporary suspension of mill operations at Tasiast due to a mill fire that occurred on April 14, 2025, which has been fully extinguished. No injuries have been reported and mining operations are continuing on plan. The Company is investigating the cause of the fire, as well as assessing the damage and potential impact on the operation. The Company’s initial assessment indica
importantArticles.title: Kinross reports temporary suspension of mill at Tasiast
